name: Steampunk Clicker
description:
Welcome to Steampunk Clicker. 

Made with devaanshG for the Brackeys Game Jam 9.

Click the gear in the centre to gain $1. 

Buy workers and upgrades in the shop (top left corner) to earn more money. 

Be careful, coins and workers reset every day, BUT you can keep upgrades using your backpack. However your backpack has limited space so choose wisely.

Try to make as much money as you can!

Enjoy.

no sound.
